MicroCutie by HelloCutie.name: MicroCutie by HelloCutie
MicroCutie by HelloCutie.description:
An excellent quality pistol with a unique Hypurrburst™ mode fire mode*. The weapon purrs when used. Hypurrburst™ is disabled if less than 4 bullets are in the clip.

When in Hypurrburst™ mode, the following applies

  • MicroCutie is ROF 1
  • Purrs audibly
  • Fires a single shot, drains clip, and does 4d6 damage
  • Cannot be used to make aimed shots

*Special fire mode not currently supported; will need to be manually applied
